text:
Flagship Biosciences | Software Engineer | Westminster CO | 80% remote

Flagship Biosciences is the largest tissue image analysis provider for the pharma industry, specializing in quantitative tissue interpretation for immuno-oncology drug development. We have an HPC backend that we leverage to provide image analysis of extremely large images.

We're looking for one or two more software engineers to help round out our team.

C++, Java, HPC, OpenGL

You can find more information at http://www.flagshipbio.com/careers/software-engineer-5/

If you apply please mention HN.
